characters.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1000 1000"><defs><clipPath id="radical_svg_id_a_8766"><path d="M1286.01-6.82 902.14 1340.24 49.66 1078.31 433.53-268.75 1286.01-6.82z" style="fill:none"/></clipPath><style>.radical-svg-cls-b-8766{fill:none;stroke:var(--color-text, #000);stroke-linecap:square;stroke-miterlimit:2;stroke-width:68px}</style></defs><path d="M341 60 220 480" class="radical-svg-cls-b-8766"/><g style="clip-path:url(#radical_svg_id_a_8766)"><path d="M241 420h519c-40 480-79 520-220 520-40 0-160-10-160-10M820 200H302" class="radical-svg-cls-b-8766"/></g></svg>

meaningMnemonic: Doesn't this look like someone on their knees, holding their hands out (clasped) and begging for something (money, their life, etc.)? That's why this radical is known as the <radical>beggar</radical>.
